Title: Wrinkled Page
Text:
Winter is here. Time to take a break and use this time to sharpen my sword skills.
Speaking of which, I met a couple of knights today. They seem to have come here drawn by the legends, hoping to continue their quests from Whisperwind Haven.
Each of them bore a family crest on their armor. It was easy to learn their identities. "In the name of the family, I shall..."
I'm sorry I lied to you, Joanna. Korlacchi. The holy name... doesn't exist. Because of the snowstorm, I was not able to attend the banquet where they were recruiting household knights.
That name, I only borrowed it from a novel about knighthood I found on a dusty shelf... I was never granted knighthood...
Forgive me...
